title: Word Counter
placeholder: Type or paste your text here...
aboutText: This is a simple word counter application built with React and Material-UI.
contactText: Have questions or feedback? Fill out the form below to get in touch with us.

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.step1: Paste your text into the text area.
howToUse.step2: Get instant insights on word count, character count, and more.
howToUse.step3: Export your text as a .txt file.
howToUse.step4: Clear the text area to start over.
